totalMembers.notes: Originally commanded 5,000 pirates across 50 ships. Decimated by Mihawk in the Grand Line, leaving approximately 100 survivors.

ships.description: Don Krieg's flagship, the only surviving ship from his fleet after the encounter with Mihawk.

jollyRoger.description: A skull and crossbones with sideburns matching Don Krieg's appearance, flanked by two hourglasses on each side symbolizing a death threat to enemies.
jollyRoger.symbolism: The hourglasses represent that time is running out for their enemies.

keyMoments.title: Krieg Pirates Arrive at Baratie
keyMoments.description: The damaged flagship of the Krieg Pirates emerges from the fog near the Baratie, causing panic among the restaurant patrons.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the crew, establishing them as a major threat despite their weakened state.

keyMoments.title: Assault on the Baratie
keyMoments.description: Don Krieg launches an attack on the Baratie after his betrayal, beginning the crew's attempt to seize the restaurant ship.
keyMoments.significance: Initiates the major conflict of the Baratie Arc.

statusHistory.description: Operating in weakened state after Grand Line defeat

reveals.information: Originally the largest pirate fleet in East Blue with 5,000 members across 50 ships
Fleet was decimated by Dracule Mihawk in the Grand Line, reducing them to about 100 survivors
Known as the most powerful and feared pirate fleet in East Blue before their Grand Line expedition
Crew relies on overwhelming numbers, superior weaponry, and deceptive tactics rather than individual strength
